meanings.definition: A person who claims to have the ability to perceive information hidden from the normal senses.
meanings.sent1: Many people seek guidance from psychics when they feel lost.
meanings.sent2: The psychic predicted that good things were coming my way.
meanings.sent3: The psychic joked that even they couldn't predict the weather accurately.
meanings.sent4: Her intuition was so sharp, it was as if she had psychic powers.
meanings.sent5: The psychic's insights into my future were surprisingly accurate.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the supposed faculty of perceiving things beyond natural sensory perception.
meanings.sent1: She had a psychic ability to sense when something was about to happen.
meanings.sent2: The mysterious house had a psychic aura that made everyone uneasy.
meanings.sent3: The psychic energy in the room felt calming and peaceful.
meanings.sent4: His eyes had a psychic quality that seemed to see right through you.
meanings.sent5: The psychic connection between the twins was uncanny and unexplainable.
